name: Jam Time!
description:
You are a jam stuck in the ground, it's your mission to survive the best you can against the bacterias!

Be careful with how you use your  jam tho...*

What you have to do is pretty simple, dodge the enemies and survive the best you can, you use your energy to move/shoot so it's up to you on how you'll manage it. Enemies drop jams as well so you can recover a bit of it, you have an experience bar with amazing buff choices for each level.

WASD or Arrows - Move

E - Attack

M - Disable music

N - Disable sfx

Esc - Pause

Programming and Sound - bigasdev

Artist - narehate
